text: These results suggest that additional factor ( s ) are necessary for full <extra_id_0> ER <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> function .
Both <extra_id_0> GATA-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and CACCC - binding proteins are critical for the developmentally regulated expression of erythroid - specific genes .

We hypothesize that interference in DNA - binding activities of <extra_id_0> GATA-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and CACCC - binding proteins is the mechanism by which the <extra_id_0> ER <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> inhibits regulation of these genes .
